objects.description: [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has obfuscated strings of code with Base64 encoding within the JavaScript version of the malware.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023)(Citation: PaloAlto Unit42 ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibileFerret October 2024) [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has also utilized the open-source tool JavaScript-Obfuscator to obfuscate strings and functions.(Citation: Esentire ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: Zscaler ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)
